headline: Figma Stock Plunges After Disappointing Post-IPO Report
summary: Figma stock shriveled after the design software firm forecast decelerating revenue growth in its first post-IPO quarterly report.

headline: Figma’s $91M Bitcoin Bet Isn’t a ‘Michael Saylor’ Move, CEO Says
summary: CEO Dylan Field distanced the company’s crypto position from evangelist extremes, saying bitcoin is part of a diversified cash approach.

headline: Figma Stock Tumbles 20%. Why Its First Earnings Report Since IPO Was Disappointing.
summary: Figma  the design software developer that went public in late July and has more than doubled from its initial public offering price, reported its first quarterly earnings since its IPO Wednesday.  Figma posted sales of $249.6 million for the second quarter, up 41% from a year ago but slightly below Wall Street’s estimates for $250 million.  Backing that out, Figma earned $28.2 million.

raw.headline: Figma Stock Tumbles 20%. Why Its First Earnings Report Since IPO Was Disappointing.
raw.summary: Figma  the design software developer that went public in late July and has more than doubled from its initial public offering price, reported its first quarterly earnings since its IPO Wednesday.  Figma posted sales of $249.6 million for the second quarter, up 41% from a year ago but slightly below Wall Street’s estimates for $250 million.  Backing that out, Figma earned $28.2 million.

headline: Adobe to bring its video editing app Premiere to iPhones
summary: The company said that Premiere on iPhone will let users edit videos and export them without any watermarks. The app will have some of the same features as its desktop version, including the ability to trim, layer, and fine-tune frames.

raw.headline: Adobe to bring its video editing app Premiere to iPhones
raw.summary: The company said that Premiere on iPhone will let users edit videos and export them without any watermarks. The app will have some of the same features as its desktop version, including the ability to trim, layer, and fine-tune frames.

headline: Webflow Launches Integration with Adobe Marketo Engage for AI-Powered Personalization
summary: Webflow today announced a new integration with Adobe Marketo Engage to further enable modern marketers navigating marketing technology. The launch reflects a continued commitment to making AI-powered personalization and experimentation more accessible for marketing teams at scale.

headline: Latest News In E-Commerce - AI Revolutionizing India's Retail Landscape
summary: India's retail and e-commerce sectors are undergoing a transformation driven by artificial intelligence (AI), with significant expansion projected from 2025 to 2030. This growth is fueled by advancements in machine learning, automation, and personalized consumer experiences, impacting everything from inventory management to customer engagement and fraud detection. AI adoption, including chatbots and real-time analytics, is enhancing decision-making and efficiency while enabling...

headline: AppsAnywhere Wins 2025 Tech Edvocate Award for Best Higher Education Solution
summary: AppsAnywhere, a student-first platform for higher education that centralizes software access, today announced it has been named the winner of the 2025 Tech Edvocate Award for Best Higher Education Solution. This award recognizes AppsAnywhere's innovation in tackling one of higher education's most persistent challenges: providing seamless access to critical academic software across diverse devices, locations and student needs.

headline: Figma is getting crushed in its post-IPO earnings debut; CEO Dylan Field is focused on AI’s long-term power to ‘raise the ceiling’
